item.title: Clean Architecture in Android: Part l
item.description: In this series I’m going to share with you how I structure my code to follow the SOLID principles in order to have a Clean Architecture in Android. A little bit of background Clean Architecture Well, in short is a software design philosophy that encapsulates a set of principles that help us as a developers to create a more scalable applications, this principles are the SOLID principles. So it isn’t platform dependent, you can use it in any software you develop with any platform.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello! My name is Daniel and I’m an Android Developer. I’ve been developing Android applications since 2017, I also did a certification as Android Professional Developer in the same year which you can checkout here. Since then I’ve been working in different Android projects. I like to write code that is extensible and maintainable using Java, Kotlin or both, for that reason I use different architectural patterns as MVVM, MVP and MVC.
